00076 void Micropolis::doUpdateHeads()
00077 {
00078     showValves();
00079     doTimeStuff();
00080     reallyUpdateFunds();
00081     updateOptions();
00082 }
00083 
00084 
00085 void Micropolis::updateMaps()
00086 {
00087     invalidateMaps();
00088     doUpdateHeads();
00089 }

00092 void Micropolis::updateGraphs()
00093 {
00094     changeCensus();
00095 }

00098 void Micropolis::updateEvaluation()
00099 {
00100     changeEval();
00101 }

00103 
00104 void Micropolis::updateHeads()
00105 {
00106     mustUpdateFunds = true;
00107     valveFlag = true;
00108     cityTimeLast = cityYearLast = cityMonthLast = totalFundsLast =
00109       resLast = comLast = indLast = -999999;
00110     doUpdateHeads();
00111 }
00112 
00113 
00115 void Micropolis::updateFunds()
00116 {
00117     mustUpdateFunds = true;
00118 }
00119 
00120 
00121 void Micropolis::reallyUpdateFunds()
00122 {
00123     if (!mustUpdateFunds) {
00124         return;
00125     }
00126 
00127     mustUpdateFunds = false;
00128 
00129     if (totalFunds != totalFundsLast) {
00130         totalFundsLast = totalFunds;
00131 
00132         callback("update", "s", "funds");
00133     }
00134 
00135 }
00136 
00137 
00138 void Micropolis::doTimeStuff()
00139 {
00140     updateDate();
00141 }
00142 
00143 
00147 void Micropolis::updateDate()
00148 {
00149     int megalinium = 1000000;
00150 
00151     cityTimeLast = cityTime >> 2;
00152 
00153     cityYear = ((int)cityTime / 48) + (int)startingYear;
00154     cityMonth = ((int)cityTime % 48) >> 2;
00155 
00156     if (cityYear >= megalinium) {
00157         setYear(startingYear);
00158         cityYear = startingYear;
00159         sendMessage(MESSAGE_NOT_ENOUGH_POWER, NOWHERE, NOWHERE, true);
00160 
00161     }
00162 
00163     if ((cityYearLast != cityYear) ||
00164         (cityMonthLast != cityMonth)) {
00165 
00166         cityYearLast = cityYear;
00167         cityMonthLast = cityMonth;
00168 
00169         callback("update", "s", "date");
00170     }
00171 }
00172 
00173 
00174 void Micropolis::showValves()
00175 {
00176     if (valveFlag) {
00177         drawValve();
00178         valveFlag = false;
00179     }
00180 }
00181 
00182 
00183 void Micropolis::drawValve()
00184 {
00185     float r, c, i;
00186 
00187     r = resValve;
00188 
00189     if (r < -1500) {
00190         r = -1500;
00191     }
00192 
00193     if (r > 1500) {
00194         r = 1500;
00195     }
00196 
00197     c = comValve;
00198 
00199     if (c < -1500) {
00200         c = -1500;
00201     }
00202 
00203     if (c > 1500) {
00204         c = 1500;
00205     }
00206 
00207     i = indValve;
00208 
00209     if (i < -1500) {
00210         i = -1500;
00211     }
00212 
00213     if (i > 1500) {
00214         i = 1500;
00215     }
00216 
00217     if ((r != resLast) ||
00218         (c != comLast) ||
00219         (i != indLast)) {
00220 
00221         resLast = (int)r;
00222         comLast = (int)c;
00223         indLast = (int)i;
00224 
00225         setDemand(r, c, i);
00226     }
00227 }
00228 
00229 
00230 void Micropolis::setDemand(float r, float c, float i)
00231 {
00232     callback("update", "s", "demand");
00233 }
00234 
00235 
00236 void Micropolis::updateOptions()
00237 {
00238     if (mustUpdateOptions) {
00239         mustUpdateOptions = false;
00240         callback("update", "s", "options");
00241     }
00242 }

00249 void Micropolis::updateUserInterface()
00250 {
00252 
00253     // city: after load file, load scenario, or generate city
00254     // map: when small overall map changes
00255     // editor: when large close-up map changes
00256     // graph: when graph changes
00257     // evaluation: when evaluation changes
00258     // budget: when budget changes
00259     // date: when date changes
00260     // funds: when funds change
00261     // demand: when demand changes
00262     // level: when level changes
00263     // speed: when speed changes
00264     // delay: when delay changes
00265     // option: when options change
00266 }
